title: Identifying the Standard Form

title: Completing the Square for the Quadratic $$2x^2$$ + $$8x$$ - $$10$$
text: To rewrite in standard form, try completing the square. What steps do you take to complete the square for the expression $$2x^2$$ + $$8x$$?

title: Factor Out the Coefficient of $$x^2$$
text: First, factor out the $$2$$ from the terms involving $$x$$. What do you get?

title: Complete the Square Inside the Parentheses
text: Now, focus on the quadratic expression inside the parentheses. What constant needs to be added and subtracted to complete the square?

title: Write the Completed Square Form
text: After completing the square, what is the new expression inside the parentheses? Remember to simplify the expression fully.

title: Final Step: Consolidate the Coefficients and the Constant
